descriptions: Migrated the entire image creation and storage system to use the highly optimized WebP format instead of PNG, significantly reducing storage requirements and bandwidth usage
Implemented an automatic backend migration script that seamlessly converts all existing legacy .png project files to .webp on first server startup
Updated the automated Garbage Collection (GC) system to properly monitor, detect, and clean up both active and orphaned .webp image assets
Rewrote frontend canvas renderer to natively encode drawn spray projects directly into WebP Base64 strings
Updated NUI loading processes and fxmanifest to ensure newly optimized .webp images are correctly loaded and displayed in the UI and in-game
